<source lang="xml">
<settings> 
  <redraw>1</redraw>

  <type>bar</type>
  
  <font>Tahoma</font>                
  <depth>20</depth>                  
  <angle>30</angle>                  
  <balloonColor>#ffffff</balloonColor>

  <column>
    <width>70</width>                
    $if(growTime)$
    <grow_time>$growTime$</grow_time>
    $endif$         
    <grow_effect>strong</grow_effect>    
    <alpha>75</alpha>
    <balloon_text>          
    <![CDATA[{description}: {value}$unit$</b><br/>({series})]]> 
    </balloon_text>    
  </column>
     
   <balloon>
     <fillColor>#ffffff</fillColor>
     <fillAlpha>100</fillAlpha>
     <cornerRadius>4</cornerRadius>
     <text_color>#000000</text_color>
     <border_width>1</border_width>
     <border_color>#5B5B63</border_color>
     <borderColor>#5B5B63</borderColor>
   </balloon>  

    <legend>             
	    <enabled>false</enabled> 
    </legend>    

    <values>
      <category>
        <rotate>30</rotate>
      </category>
      <value>
        <unit>$unit$</unit>
      </value>
    </values>

  <plot_area>              
    <margins>              
      <left>150</left>        
      <top>30</top>         
      <right>20</right>   
      <bottom>30</bottom>  
    </margins>
  </plot_area>

</settings>
</source>
